Description:
NPE when preview crosstab in Excel emitter.

Build number:2.2.0.v2007042309

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a crosstab.
2. Preview in excel emitter.

Expected result:
Display crosstab data.

Actual result:
NPE

the generateBy may be NULL for some extended items (such as XTAB), so we can't ensure that the generateBy is the design object in emitter.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 181113 ***

Reopen it.
Verify in build 2.2.0.v20070613 and the NPE still exists, so it's not a duplicate bug.

I can not reproduce the NPE exception when exported the report.

I removed my local source files and checked the source code from cvs and exported the report to xls, it works well.
I'm not sure why the exception was still thrown on your side.
The attached xls was exported from my computer.
If you still can reproduce the bug, please attach exception trace. thans in advance.

Created an attachment (id=71121)
xls exported from my computer

I can reproduce this bug in several machines and in fact no testers here can preview xtab successfully in excel.
The stack trace is always the same as in bug description area.

Could you try to get 2.2 latest nightly build and have a try, you can find nightly build in http://download.eclipse.org/birt/downloads/build_list.php

Sorry for my mistake. I did not understand the process of BIRT and forgot to inform the build team to tag the excel emitter to nightly build so that you are still working on the old version and puzzled by NPE.

The change of excel emitter should be included by today nightly build. If you can 
reproduce this problem on it, please let me know and attach the exception trace.

Sorry again for my mistake:)
It works in build 2.2.0.v200706131529, close it.
